tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I've recently went to the Clinic for Root canal Treatment.
Dr Akshaya mam Kindly inspected the infection and gave timely Treatment and exact suggestions required to improve my health situation.
Root canal Treatment process takes place with my specified time and the fixing crown perfectly fit to my tooth I don't even now it's there.
Also follow up calls for my appointment and timely reminders which is super good.
This is the first time I'm doing "Tooth scaling" which is game changer I didn't know actually my teeth will be this bright.
I don't even have anything negative about my treatment.
Definitely recommend to everyone.
*** **** ******* * **** **** ********** I have started recommending Dr. Akshaya to people who i know with dental problems ... Nurse Durga was also very caring... Clinic was very clean .

review:
I went to sai nivedhan dental clinic for rootcanal treatment.The appointments were on time...
Dr.akshayanarayanan explained the procedure i. Detail...treatment went smoothly...i would highly recommend Dr.Akshaya narayanan for your future dental treatments

I did visit Doctor Dr. Akshaya recently regarding Mum's Dental issues. She was very friendly helped mum to go through the procedure of doing Root Canal and Full Mouth Rehabilitation and everything was good. We're extremely happy and satisfied with the service. I would recommended doctor to our friends and relatives for Dental Issues.

Dr Akshaya is very courteous and explains the issues in detail to the patients along with the remedy she is planning. Hence we feel so safe and secure in her hands. I never seen a doctor so patient to listen to our layman questions and always answers them in a reassuring manner. She is very very good dentist.

I went to sai nivedhan dental care for cleaning then I came to know that doctor is a gum specialist.. I was completely satisfied with her treatment.. Doctor explained all the instructions very patiently.... I strongly recommend doctor akshayaüëçüëçüëç
Very good experience & fixed my dental problem. Doctor was really friendly & treated my dental issues very well.

review: I felt very comfortable & satisfied with Dr's treatment, care & they way she talks .Pls keep up the good work & standard. Thank you for your service.

**** ******* ** **** ***** I had a comfortable  and pain free treatment. I underwent wisdom tooth removal and gum treatment. Regular follow up call was also done. The doctor has now become our family dentist
********* *** **** ***** The explanation given by the doctor regarding my teeth condition was very clear and if i had any doubts regarding treatment Doctor patiently answered my questions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Due to severe pain visited Tash Dental Mogappair.Initially Dr.Akshaya started analysis. Took detailed review before concluding the issue. Explained the issues in friendly way and proposed treatments.
When Doctor Akshara went on leave, introduced  Doctor Asha explaining the issues to her and inform further treatment will continue by her.
During very crisis time Doctor Asha gave priority to treat me.
Excellent post treatment follow up which I never come across in the past.

Yesterday I have visited this dental clinic with pain in my teeth and fear in mind. But after the treatment both pain and fear have gone purely because of the gentle behavior of the staff and the dentist. Iam fully convinced and happy with the advice and the treatment given by the dentist. The charges are also very normal. The ambiance is also good.
